                        <a id="moneyMarketNote2">&nbsp;</a>	 					
<div id="disclosureMM" style="">
							<!-- check for Money Market Relatioship product to determine if the disclosure needs to be shown-->



	

	
		
	

	
		
	


<p class="disclosure">1. In order to qualify for a Relationship Rate on Premiere Money Market, you must have a linked checking account (for the Performance Checking Relationship Rate, you must have a linked Performance Checking or Virtual WalletÂ® with Performance Spend; for the Performance Select Checking Relationship Rate, you must have a linked Performance Select Checking or Virtual Wallet with Performance Select) and meet one of the following requirements:
</p>
<ul class="ulDisclosure noPadding">
	<li>â€¢	Make a combination of 5 or more PIN and/or signature point-of-sale transactions (excluding cash advances) posted during the previous calendar month to your Checking account using your VisaÂ® Debit Card or to your linked Visa Credit Card.</li>
	<li>â€¢	Have $2,000 in qualifying direct deposits ($1,000 for WorkPlace or Military Banking customers) in a linked Virtual Wallet with Performance Spend or Performance Checking during the previous calendar month.</li>
	<li>â€¢	Have $5,000 in qualifying direct deposits in a linked Virtual Wallet with Performance Select or Performance Select Checking during the previous calendar month.</li>
</ul>
<p class="disclosure">Starting with the calendar month following when you open your Premiere Money Market account and monthly thereafter, whether the account earns the variable Standard or Relationship Rate for the entire calendar month will be determined on the first of the month based upon the number of qualifying transactions or direct deposit requirement from the previous calendar month.
</p>
<p class="disclosure">If there are changes to your linked checking account (it is closed, changed to a new account type or no longer linked to your Premiere Money Market account), you may no longer qualify for a Relationship Rate, or the rates may otherwise change to those in effect at the time of the change.
</p> 
<p class="disclosure"><b>Important Note:</b> Your Premiere Money Market account will earn the highest rate available to you (Rate Offer, Standard or Relationship Rate) for which you qualify based on the applicable balance tier and the criteria above.
</p>
<p class="disclosure"> 2. Annual Percentage Yield (APY) accurate as of 11/22/2018. Rates may change after account is opened. Fees may reduce earnings.</p>

<p class="disclosure">Federal regulation prohibits you from making
	more than a total of 6 transfers each month to other accounts from a
	savings or money market account (including transfers to another account
	for overdraft protection) or to third parties each month by check,
	through point-of-sale purchase transactions with a banking card, by
	preauthorized or automatic agreements, telephone, or online. See your
	account agreement for more information. Other limits may apply to your
	account. Excessive transactions may result in changing your Money
	Market or Savings account to a non-interest bearing checking account.</p>

	on Premiere Money Market, you must have a linked checking account (for
	the Performance Checking Relationship Rate, you must have a linked

	Performance Select Checking Relationship Rate, you must have a linked
	Performance Select Checking or Virtual Wallet with Performance Select)

	<li>â€¢ Make a combination of 5 or more PIN and/or signature
		point-of-sale transactions (excluding cash advances) posted during the
		previous calendar month to your Checking account using your VisaÂ®
		Debit Card or to your linked Visa Credit Card.</li>

		WorkPlace or Military Banking customers) in a linked Virtual Wallet
		with Performance Spend or Performance Checking during the previous
		calendar month.</li>

		Virtual Wallet with Performance Select or Performance Select Checking

<p class="disclosure">Starting with the calendar month following
	when you open your Premiere Money Market account and monthly
	thereafter, whether the account earns the variable Standard or
	Relationship Rate for the entire calendar month will be determined on
	the first of the month based upon the number of qualifying transactions
	or direct deposit requirement from the previous calendar month.</p>
<p class="disclosure">If there are changes to your linked checking
	account (it is closed, changed to a new account type or no longer
	linked to your Premiere Money Market account), you may no longer
	qualify for a Relationship Rate, or the rates may otherwise change to
	those in effect at the time of the change.</p>

<script type="text/javascript">

    var e1;
    var e2;
    
   e1=document.getElementById("Standard Savings Relationship Rate");
   
   e2=document.getElementById("Standard Savings");
  
   e1.style.float="right";
  
   
   e1.style.width="35%";
   e2.style.width="65%";
   
   e1.style.backgroundColor="";

   var e3;
   e3=document.getElementsByName("Standard Savings Relationship Rate-colData");
   
   var n;
   n=e3.length;
   var el;
   
   for(el=0;el<n;el++)
   {
      e3[el].style.display="none";
   }
   
   var e4;
   e4=document.getElementById("Standard Savings Relationship Rate-colTitle");
   
   e4.style.display="none";
   
   
   var elemnts;
   elemnts=document.getElementsByName("Standard Savings Relationship Rate-colData");
   
   var nElemnts;
   nElemnts=elemnts.length;
   
   var nn;
   for(nn=0; nn<nElemnts; nn++)
   {
      elemnts[nn].className="";
      elemnts[nn].style.backgroundColor="";
      
      elemnts[nn].parentElement.className="";
      elemnts[nn].parentElement.style.backgroundColor="";
   }
   
   var e5;
   e5=document.getElementById("Standard Savings Relationship Rate-tbl");
   e5.className="";
   e5.style.backgroundColor="";
   
  //$("'S' is for Savings").find(".headerColumn").css("width","16%");

</script>

<p class="disclosure">1. In order to qualify for a Relationship Rate on Standard Savings, you must have a linked Standard Checking, Performance Checking, Virtual WalletÂ® with Performance Spend, Performance Select Checking or Virtual Wallet with Performance Select and meet one of the following requirements:
</p>
<ul class="ulDisclosure noPadding">
	<li>â€¢	A combination of 5 or more PIN and/or signature point-of-sale transactions (excluding cash advances) must have posted to your linked PNC Checking account during the previous calendar month using your PNC VisaÂ® Debit Card or your linked PNC Visa Credit Card.</li>
	<li>â€¢	Have $500 in qualifying direct deposits in a linked Standard Checking during the previous calendar month.</li>
	<li>â€¢	Have $2,000 in qualifying direct deposits ($1,000 for WorkPlace or Military Banking customers) in a linked Virtual Wallet with Performance Spend or Performance Checking during the previous calendar month.</li>
	<li>â€¢	Have $5,000 in qualifying direct deposits in a linked Virtual Wallet with Performance Select or Performance Select Checking during the previous calendar month.</li>
</ul>
<p class="disclosure">Starting with the calendar month following when you open your Standard Savings account and monthly thereafter, whether the account earns the variable Standard or Relationship Rate for the entire calendar month will be determined on the first of the month based upon the number of qualifying transactions or direct deposit requirement from the previous calendar month.
</p>
<p class="disclosure">If there are changes to your linked checking account (it is closed, changed to a new account type or no longer linked to your Standard Savings account), you may no longer qualify for a Relationship Rate, or the rates may otherwise change to those in effect at the time of the change.
</p> 
<p class="disclosure"><b>Important Note:</b> Your Standard Savings account will earn the highest rate available to you (Rate Offer, Standard or Relationship Rate) for which you qualify based on the applicable balance tier and the criteria above.
</p>


				<p class="disclosure"> 2. Annual Percentage Yield (APY) accurate as of 11/22/2018. Rates may change after account is opened. Fees may reduce earnings.</p>

<p class="disclosure">Federal regulation prohibits you from making
	more than a total of 6 transfers each month to other accounts from a
	savings or money market account (including transfers to another account
	for overdraft protection) or to third parties each month by check,
	through point-of-sale purchase transactions with a banking card, by
	preauthorized or automatic agreements, telephone, or online. See your
	account agreement for more information. Other limits may apply to your
	account. Excessive transactions may result in changing your Money
	Market or Savings account to a non-interest bearing checking account.</p>

                                      <a id="cdNote2">&nbsp;</a>                               
  				
						<p class="disclosure"> 1. Annual Percentage Yield (APY) accurate as of 11/22/2018. Penalty for early withdrawal. Fees may reduce earnings.</p>

						<p class="disclosure">2. IMPORTANT DISCLOSURE INFORMATION: Annual Percentage Yield (APY) accurate as of 11/22/2018. No withdrawals without penalty within first seven days. No partial withdrawals permitted. Fees may reduce earnings.</p>
						<p class="disclosure">
3. In order to qualify for these CD rates, you must link a new or existing select PNC checking account to the CD. We will only link accounts at your direction. At the end of your Promotional term, your account will automatically convert to the standard CD term that is closest to but not greater than your original CD term based on the following standard CD terms:&nbsp; 6, 12, 18, 24, 36, 60 month terms. In addition, your CD rate will convert to the rate applicable to the standard CD term.
</p>

    <p><sup id="sup1">1</sup>APY effective as of November 19, 2018. Popular, in its sole discretion, reserves the right to change or terminate this offer at any time. This offer is available in all Popular branches and via our website for a limited time only. To qualify for the promotional Annual Percentage Yield (APY), new or existing customers must open a CD with a required minimum balance and opening deposit of $1,000 in new money. New money is defined as deposits not previously held with Popular. APY assumes principal and interest remain on deposit until maturity. A penalty will be imposed for early withdrawal. Fees may reduce earnings on the account. Promotional Rate is valid on the initial term. Automatically renews with the same term and rate applicable at the time of renewal. Popular Bank (referred to herein as â€œourâ€ or â€œPopularâ€) is a member of the FDIC and operates under the assumed name â€œPopularâ€ in the markets in which it operates. Accordingly, Popular and Popular Bank are the same FDIC-insured institution.</p>

<p><sup id="sup2">2</sup>Promotional Annual Percentage Yield (APY) of 2.65% effective as of November 19, 2018 for all new 13 Month CD customers that qualify for Popular Gold Rewards. Promotional APY of 2.60% effective as of November 19, 2018 for all new 13 Month CD customers that qualify for Popular Silver Rewards. Promotional APY of 2.55% effective as of November 19, 2018 for all new 13 Month CD customers. You must be eligible for and maintain a Popular Prestige Checking account in order to qualify for Popular Rewards. Popular Rewards Terms and Conditions will apply. Please refer to "Your Guide to Popular Prestige Checking" and to the Popular Rewards Terms and Conditions for more information. Customers with a combined deposit and/or outstanding line of credit balances of $100,000 and more may qualify for Gold Rewards, and customers with a combined deposit and/or outstanding line of credit between $25,000 and $99,999.99 may qualify for Silver Rewards.</p>
</div>

    <div class="apy">
      <div class="apy-value">0.75</div>
      <div class="apy-percent">%</div>
      <div class="apy-label">APY <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="btn disclosure-icon" role="button" tabindex="0" data-target=".disclosure-3" data-original-title="" title=""><span class="sr-only">Disclosure</span></a></div>

    <div class="apy-disclaimer" style="clear:both; font-size: 11px; line-height: 13px; padding-top: 20px;">
      The Annual Percentage Yield (APY) for a Certificate of Deposit (CD) account is effective as of 11/19/2018 and subject to change without notice.

  </div>
  <div class="detail">
    <h2>With our Popular Direct CDs,<br>You'll Enjoy:</h2>
    <ul>
<li><span>Competitive Rates</span></li>
<li><span>Interest that Compounds Daily</span></li>
<li><span>A Safety Net - Deposits are Insured by the FDIC<a href="javascript:void(0);" class="btn disclosure-icon" role="button" tabindex="0" data-target=".disclosure-91" data-original-title="" title=""><span class="sr-only">Disclosure</span></a>
<div class="disclosure-91" style="display: none;">
    <p>All Popular Direct deposit products are offered by, and will be opened through, Popular Bank. Popular Bank is a Member FDIC institution and a New York state chartered bank. Processing services for all Popular Direct deposit products are provided by Popular Bank. All deposits with Popular Bank (including deposits through Popular Direct deposit products) are insured by the FDIC up to the applicable maximum amount allowed by law for each deposit ownership category. For more information about FDIC insurance coverage of deposits accounts, visit https://www.fdic.gov/deposit/deposits</p></div>

</span></li>

<p>
	<a href="//timetrade.com/app/providentcu/workflows/pcu001/schedule/?appointmentTypeGroupId=accounts.services&amp;appointmentTypeId=checking.accounts" target="_blank" onclick="popupProvWin(this.href,800,720); pageTracker._trackPageview('/checking_description/appointment'); return false;" data-aesra-score="linkNewWindowWarning:1;">Schedule&nbsp;Appointment<span data-ae-pem-ignore="true" style="display: none;" class="ae-compliance-indent ae-new-window"> Opens a New Window. </span></a>
</p>
<ul class="bulletblue">			
	<li>Free Visa<sup class="sup">®</sup> <a href="/providentIF.asp?i=checkingResources&amp;search=checkCards" target="MiddleContent">debit card</a> that can be used with your <a href="/providentIF.asp?i=wallet" target="MiddleContent">digital wallet</a> including: Apple Pay, Google Pay™, Samsung Pay, and Visa Checkout.</li>
	<li>Surcharge-free <a href="/providentIF.asp?i=ATMs" target="MiddleContent" aria-label="atm network locations">ATM network</a> that includes over 30,000 CO-OP® and 23,000 MoneyPass® <a href="/providentIF.asp?i=ATMs" target="MiddleContent" aria-label="atm network locations" role="none">locations</a></li>
	<li>Free online access through <a href="/providentIF.asp?i=AboutOnlineBanking" target="MiddleContent">online banking</a></li> 
	<li>Free online bill payment with <a href="/providentIF.asp?i=AboutOnlineBanking&amp;search=billmanager" target="MiddleContent">Bill Manager</a></li>
	<li>Use <a href="/providentIF.asp?i=AboutOnlineBanking&amp;search=edeposit" target="MiddleContent">e-Deposit</a> to make check deposits with your scanner or mobile phone (<a href="#" onclick="top.efaqIF('Q132570406400019','440','380'); return false;" class="efaqlinks" role="button" aria-label="e-deposit eligibility criteria">Eligibility criteria</a>)</li>
	<li>No per-check fees</li>
	<li>No fee travelers checks, official checks, and money orders*</li>
	<li><a href="/risk-free/Zero_Liability.html" onclick="top.popDetails(this.href,'iframe',540,680); return false;" target="_blank" data-aesra-score="linkNewWindowWarning:1;">Zero Liability Fraud Protection Guarantee<span data-ae-pem-ignore="true" style="display: none;" class="ae-compliance-indent ae-new-window"> Opens a New Window. </span></a></li>
	<li><a href="/providentIF.asp?i=overdraft" target="MiddleContent">Overdraft Protection</a>: There is <b>no fee</b> associated with this service for most checking accounts at Provident. (Restrictions apply. <a href="/providentIF.asp?i=overdraft" target="MiddleContent" aria-label="overdraft protection details" aria-hidden="true">Click for details</a>.)</li>
	<li><a href="/providentIF.asp?i=overdraft" target="MiddleContent">Courtesy Pay</a>: If you don't have enough funds in your overdraft accounts, Provident may still approve your overdrafts within your available Courtesy Pay limit. There is a <a href="/AFrames/Directory/ServiceCharges.asp#courtesyPayCheck" onclick="popupProvWin(this.href); return false;" aria-label="courtesy pay fee">fee</a> for each overdrawn item. (Restrictions apply. Not available for Youth Checking, Business Checking, and Health Savings Accounts. <a href="/providentIF.asp?i=overdraft" target="MiddleContent" aria-label="overdraft protection details" aria-hidden="true">Click for details</a>.)</li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size: 12px;">All CD rates may change at any time without prior notice. After your CD is opened, the interest rate is fixed for the term unless the One-Time Rate Bump Up option is exercised (if applicable). A penalty is imposed for early withdrawal. </button></h4>
<div class="jqvcAccordion-content faq-content-none" id="jqvcAccordion-0" aria-hidden="false" aria-expanded="true">

<br>
<br>
<strong>Online:
<br></strong> Easily <a href="https://apply.purepoint.com/oao" tabindex="0">open an account</a> right from your computer, tablet or mobile device.
<br>
<br>
<strong>By phone:
<br></strong> Call us toll free at 1-855-488-7873, Monday â€“ Friday, 8:00 a.m. â€“ 9:00 p.m. Eastern Time (except federal holidays).

<br>
<br>
<strong>Come see us:
<br></strong> Visit a PurePoint Financial Center where weâ€™ll be happy to help you. <a href="/online-banking/locations" tabindex="0">See if thereâ€™s one near you</a>.
<br>
<br>

   </p>

   </p>
</div><h4 class="jqvcAccordion-title" data-faqitemid="tcm:22-2348" aria-hidden="true"><button class="jqvcAccordion__trigger" aria-expanded="false" role="button" aria-controls="jqvcAccordion-4" data-faqitemid="tcm:22-2348" tabindex="0">
	
	  
	    How do I fund my PurePoint savings or CD account?
		
	    
</button></h4>
<div class="jqvcAccordion-content faq-content-none" id="jqvcAccordion-4" aria-hidden="true" aria-expanded="false">
    <p>
        
	
	
	You can conveniently fund your PurePoint account(s) with an online funds transfer, mobile deposit, wire transfer or by mailing us a check. For CD accounts, you can only make a deposit when you open the account.
<br>
<br>
If you need assistance or have any questions about funding your account, please call us toll free at 1-855-488-7873, Monday â€“ Friday, 8:00 a.m. â€“ 9:00 p.m. Eastern Time (except federal holidays).
<br>
<br>
<strong>Online funds transfer:</strong>
<br>
You can fund your account by linking it to your checking or savings account at another U.S. financial institution, then making an online transfer into your PurePoint account. (Youâ€™ll need the routing number and account number of the account from which youâ€™re transferring funds.)
<br>
<br>
<strong>Mobile deposit:</strong>
<br>
<a href="https://online.purepoint.com/banking/j_spring_security_logout?quiet=1" tabindex="0">Sign in</a> to Online Banking, select Deposit and follow the instructions to complete a Mobile Deposit.
<br>
<br>
<strong>Wire transfer:</strong>
<br>
Hereâ€™s the information youâ€™ll need to provide to the U.S. bank that will make a wire transfer into your PurePoint account. (Please note that we accept domestic wires in U.S. funds only; international wires are prohibited.)
<br>
Receiving bank: PurePoint Financial
<br>
ABA/Routing number: 122238310
<br>
Beneficiary account number: Your PurePoint account number
<br>
Beneficiary account name: Your account name as it appears on your PurePoint statement
<br>
<br>
<strong>Mailing a check:</strong>
<br>
1) Write a check, payable to yourself, from your existing checking account at another financial institution (U.S. banks only; no foreign checks) and sign it.
<br>
2) Endorse the back of the check with your signature, and write in â€œFor Deposit Only to PurePoint Financialâ€ and your PurePoint Financial account number.
<br>
3) For standard and certified U.S. postal mail delivery, send check to:
<br>
PurePoint Financial
<br>
P.O. Box 870
<br>
Glendale, CA 91209
<br>
<br>
Should you choose to mail your check using expedited courier delivery, please contact the Client Support Center at 1-855-488-7873 to receive additional instructions.
	
	
	
   </p>

<h4 class="jqvcAccordion-title" data-faqitemid="tcm:22-1864" aria-hidden="true"><button class="jqvcAccordion__trigger" aria-expanded="false" role="button" aria-controls="jqvcAccordion-0" data-faqitemid="tcm:22-1864" tabindex="0">

<br><br>
â€¢Securing your information with industry-standard encryption
<br>
â€¢Setting strict requirements for passwords
<br>
â€¢Requiring multi-factor authentication
<br>
â€¢Automatic log-out after a period of inactivity
<br>
â€¢Ongoing and proactive suspicious activity monitoring
<br><br>
We suggest that you take precautions such as keeping your User ID and password safe, running an updated version of your virus protection software, and notifying us immediately if you suspect fraudulent activity. <a href="/online-banking/online_security" tabindex="0">Learn more</a> about our online security practices.
	
	
	
   </p>
</div><h4 class="jqvcAccordion-title" data-faqitemid="tcm:22-1893" aria-hidden="true"><button class="jqvcAccordion__trigger" aria-expanded="false" role="button" aria-controls="jqvcAccordion-2" data-faqitemid="tcm:22-1893" tabindex="0">

<br><span><br></span> â€¢Collect personal and financial information to provide you with the services you sign up for.
<br>
â€¢Share your personal information to process transactions and maintain your accounts.
<br>
â€¢Share personal information to market our products or the products of our partners and affiliates.
<br><br>
For more details, please see our <a href="/online-banking/privacy" tabindex="0">Privacy Policy</a>.
	
	
	
   </p>

tabindex="0">18.00%</td></tr></tbody></table></div></div></div></div><div class="tables-info"><span class="tables-info-indent">Variable Rate Loans:</span> For Savings Secured Loans the Annual Percentage Rate (APR) for all advances on all existing balances will be subject to change on the first day of each month based on the Basic Savings rate published monthly. For Credit Card Loans, the rate is based on your creditworthiness.  The APR will vary with the market based on the Prime Rate.   The maximum interest rate will never exceed the rate permitted under the Federal Credit Union Act (currently, this maximum is 18%).  If your rate increases, additional payments will be required.  For Overdraft Line-of-Credit (Checking Reserve), rates are subject to change.  Fixed Home Equity Loan rate reflects a 0.25% discount for direct deposit. Undergraduate Private Education Line-of-Credit Loan rate reflects a 0.25% discount for auto-pay during repayment only. Quorum is an equal housing lender.</div></div><div class="all-tables-wrap"><h2 class="tables-title" id="Banking" tabindex="0">Banking <span class="mobile-show" tabindex="0">Rates</span></h2><div <p>â€  Annual Percentage Yield(APY). APY calculation assumes that funds will be held on deposit for 365 days with no rate change, fees assessed, withdrawals, or deposits made and will be applied to the entire collected balance of the applicable tier.</p>
<p><sup>1</sup>The increased Annual Percentage Yield added to the Personal Money Market and/or Rewards CD base APY is valid only for the time the customer remains at the required Rewards Banking Level. If a customer falls into a lower Rewards Level that does not receive the increased APY (i.e., Silver Level), the customer's APY will revert to the normal Personal Money Market and/or Personal CD APY at that time. IRA CDs are NOT eligible for Rewards CD increased APYs. Customers may not combine promotional offers, rates, or other incentives with discounts or increases in the APY for Rewards Banking accounts.</p>
<p>Please refer to the <a href="/-/media/Files/Disclosures/DISC-MKT-020_combined.pdf?la=en&amp;hash=B36DE9B12FE5DD1F65EA93F4B2A5E38BC3ADB86D">Understanding Your Deposit Account Agreement &amp; Disclosures (UYDAAD)</a> brochure, Addendums to the UYDAAD, and the Schedule of Fees and Minimum Balances for additional information about the terms and conditions that apply to deposit accounts and services. CD accounts earn interest at a fixed rate, except for Rewards CDs, which earn interest at a variable rate. Fixed rate means that, after the CD is opened, you receive the applicable interest rate until the CD matures. The checking, savings, and money market accounts listed above are variable rate accounts. Variable rate means that at our discretion, we may change the Annual Percentage Yield/Interest Rate on the account at any time.</p>
<p><strong>Rewards CDs, Personal CDs, CESA CDs, IRA CDs:</strong>&nbsp;There is no minimum balance to obtain the disclosed APY. A penalty is imposed for early withdrawal. The APY assumes interest will remain on deposit until maturity. A withdrawal will reduce earnings. IRA Retirement CDs are only available to consumers.</p>
<p><strong>Rewards Banking with Interest Checking, Personal Interest Checking,&nbsp;Personal Money Market:</strong>&nbsp;There is no minimum balance to obtain the disclosed APY. This account is a tiered rate account. Maintenance or activity fees could reduce earnings.</p>
<p><strong>Personal Savings, Minor Savings, Holiday Saver, Coverdell Education Savings, Retirement Savings, Health Savings Account:</strong>&nbsp;There is no minimum balance to obtain the disclosed APY. Maintenance or activity fees could reduce earnings.</p>
<p>Summary of Deposit Rates Offered</p>

http://www.regions.com/personal_banking/regular_cd.rf, #aspnetForm > div:nth-child(7) > div > div.emsDetail > div.emsContent_470, <div class="emsContent_470"><table width="640px">
   <tbody><tr>
   <td>
   <div style="width: 350px; text-align: left;">
   <div>
   <h3>
   <span id="Span3" style="width: 350px;">REGULAR CD                              </span>
   </h3>
   <div style="width: 350px; text-align: left;">
   <span id="Span4">The Interest Rate and Annual Percentage Yield (APY) are accurate as of:</span>&nbsp;11/23/2018
   </div>
   </div>
   </div>
   </td>
   <td align="right">
   <a href="https://www.regions.com/personal_banking/make_an_appointment_privacy_notice.rf" target="_parent"><b>Make an Appointment</b></a>    </td>   </tr>  </tbody></table>  <div style="width: 640px;">   <hr style="border: 0; color: #9E9E9E; background-color: #9E9E9E; height: 1px; width: 100%; text-align: left;">  </div>  <br>  <div style="width: 640px;"><div style="width: 640px; margin-top: 20px;">   <p>The relationship interest rates and Annual Percentage Yields (APYs) below are available for customers who meet certain relationship requirements established by Regions Bank as follows: 1) the Account must be opened with a minimum deposit of $10,000, 2) the primary or secondary designated owner on the Account must be the primary or secondary designated owner on a Regions Bank checking account, and 3) the checking account must be and remain open during the entire Account term. If you do not meet the bankâ€™s relationship requirements, your account will earn the lower Standard Pricing interest rates and APYs. Details about Relationship Pricing and Standard Pricing are disclosed in other documentation related to time deposit accounts and are available from the Bankâ€™s customer service representatives. Opening account balance must be less than $1,000,000. CDs (Certificates of Deposit) are time deposits. Interest on CDs longer than 12 months must be paid at least annually. Substantial penalty for early withdrawal. Fees could reduce your earnings on account. No other bonus rate premiums available with this offer. Offer available for a limited time and is subject to change. Not available for brokered deposits, public entities, or financial institutions.</p>  </div>   <div style="width: 632px; background: #f2f2f2; border: 1px solid #cdcdcd; padding: 4px;">    <div style="margin-bottom: 4px;">     <span style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 110%;">PROMOTIONAL RELATIONSHIP RATES</span>    </div>    <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:100%;>" <tr=""><tbody><tr><td style="width:225px;">Term</td><td style="width:225px;">Interest Rate</td><td>Annual Percentage Yield</td></tr><tr style="font-weight: normal;"><td style="height:24px;">12-15  months</td><td>2.37%</td><td>2.40%</td></tr></tbody></table>   </div>  </div>    <br> <div style="width: 640px; margin-top: 20px;">   <p>The minimum balance to open a time deposit with a term of 90 days or more is $500. The minimum balance to open a time deposit with a term of 7-89 days is $2,500. The Relationship Pricing interest rates and APYs disclosed in this document are available to depositors who meet the following relationship requirements for the entire applicable term of the account: (i) the time deposit term must be at least 32 days, (ii) the primary or secondary designated owner on the time deposit must be the primary or secondary designated owner on a Regions Bank checking account, and (iii) the checking account must be and remain open during the entire term of the time deposit. If you do not meet the bankâ€™s relationship requirements, your account will earn the lower Standard Pricing interest rates and APYs. Details about Relationship Pricing and Standard Pricing are disclosed in other documentation related to time deposit accounts and are available from the Bankâ€™s customer service representatives. CDs (Certificates of Deposit) are time deposits. Interest on CDs longer than 12 months must be paid at least annually. Substantial penalty for early withdrawal. Fees could reduce your earnings on account.</p>  </div> <div style="width: 632px; background: #ffffff; border: 1px solid #ffffff; padding: 4px;">   <div style="margin-bottom: 4px;">
    <span style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 110%;">RELATIONSHIP RATES</span>   </div>   <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:100%;>" <tr=""><tbody><tr><td style="width:225px;">Term</td><td style="width:225px;">Interest Rate</td><td>Annual Percentage Yield</td></tr><tr><td colspan="3"><hr noshade="" style="height: 1px;"></td></tr><tr style="font-weight: style="height:24px;">1-5  months</td><td>0.03%</td><td>0.03%</td></tr><tr><td colspan="3"><hr noshade="" style="height: 1px;"></td></tr><tr style="font-weight: normal;"><td style="height:24px;">6-11  months</td><td>0.05%</td><td>0.05%</td></tr><tr><td colspan="3"><hr noshade="" style="height: 1px;"></td></tr><tr style="font-weight: normal;"><td style="height:24px;">16-17  months</td><td>0.10%</td><td>0.10%</td></tr><tr><td colspan="3"><hr noshade="" style="height: 1px;"></td></tr><tr style="font-weight: normal;"><td style="height:24px;">18-23  months</td><td>0.10%</td><td>0.10%</td></tr><tr><td colspan="3"><hr noshade="" style="height: 1px;"></td></tr><tr style="font-weight: normal;"><td style="height:24px;">24-29 months</td><td>0.50%</td><td>0.50%</td></tr><tr><td colspan="3"><hr noshade="" style="height: 1px;"></td></tr><tr style="font-weight: normal;"><td style="height:24px;">60-72                             <h3 id="ultimate">Ultimate Checking </h3>
                            <p>A paperless checking account that offers the best of everything. If you like to get the most for your money, Ultimate checking is for you. </p>
                            <p class="section-title-open"><a href="#" aria-controls="section-1" aria-expanded="true">Click to read more/less <span><i class="fa fa-minus-square-o" aria-hidden="true"></i></span></a></p>
                            <div class="section-content-open" id="section-1">
                                <p>Earn competitive interest when you meet these requirements:</p>
                                <ul>
                                    <li>Make 15 debit card transactions per statement cycle </li>
                                    <li>Enroll and receive eStatements </li>
                                    <li>Have at least one direct deposit, one automatic debit, or one online bill pay clear the account per statement cycle</li>
                                </ul>

                        </ul>

                            <li>Credit fee: None</li>
                            <li>Deposit fee: on us â€“ none</li>

                            <li>Transit - $.08/item - not on us</li>
                        </ul>
                        <p>The fees listed above can be offset by a service charge credit that is given on the average collected balance and is computed using the average 3-month Treasury Bill </p>

<p><span class="disclaimer">$2,000 minimum deposit to open a CD account.</span></p>
<p><span class="disclaimer">Receive a Premium Rate on Certificates of Deposit with a Rhinebeck Bank Priority Elite Checking account. Certain terms may apply.&nbsp;<span style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">13-month and 20-month CD promotions are not eligible for Premium Rate.&nbsp;</span> </span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 10px; font-style: italic;">The 13-month CD is a promotional product and can be discontinued at any time.</span><span style="font-size: 10px; font-style: italic;">The 20-month CD is a promotional product and can be discontinued at any time.</span></p>
<p><span class="disclaimer">*APY (Annual Percentage Yield) Fees may reduce earnings. To obtain APY, all interest and principal must be left on deposit for full term.</span></p>

<h2 id="mcetoc_1blgf04bk0">Free Savings&nbsp;</h2>
<div><br></div>
<div><a href="https://secure.andera.com/index.cfm?fiid=7979FB9D75C8471A81DF22D9F7198EE6" data-link-id="" data-link-type-id="url" class="btn btn-default" data-disclaimer-id="null" target="_self">open your account online</a></div>

<div><strong>Transaction Limits</strong>:<strong>&nbsp;</strong><span style="font-size: 0.9375rem;">You are limited to a total of six (6) Limited Transactions from your money market and savings account per statement period. We count check transactions on your money market account on the day the check is presented to us for payment, regardless of when you may have written it (including if it was written in a prior statement period). If you exceed your Limited Transaction limit on your money market and savings account, we may assess you an Excess Transaction Fee for each Limited Transaction over the limit. Additionally, if you exceed your Limited Transaction limit on a regular basis, we may close your money market or savings account, or change this type of account to a different deposit account you are eligible to maintain.</span></div>

<h2 id="mcetoc_1bldub7f21">Money Market Savings&nbsp;</h2>

<div>Variable interest rates; may change after the account is opened. Fees could reduce your earnings.</div>
<div>The APY for each balance tier in your Rockland Trust Money Market Savings Account will apply to the entire balance - for example, if you have a daily balance of $1,200,000.00, you will receive an APY of 0.45% on your entire balance.</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div><span style="font-size: 0.9375rem;"><span><strong>Transaction Limits</strong>:</span><span>&nbsp;</span><span>You are limited to a total of six (6) Limited Transactions from your money market and savings account per statement period. We count check transactions on your money market account on the day the check is presented to us for payment, regardless of when you may have written it (including if it was written in a prior statement period). If you exceed your Limited Transaction limit on your money market and savings account, we may assess you an Excess Transaction Fee for each Limited Transaction over the limit. Additionally, if you exceed your Limited Transaction limit on a regular basis, we may close your money market or savings account, or change this type of account to a different deposit account you are eligible to maintain.</span></span></div>

<section class="av_textblock_section " itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/CreativeWork"><div class="avia_textblock  av_inherit_color " style="color:#ffffff; " itemprop="text"><p>Kasasa Cash® is a free checking account that pays you interest in cash every month. With no minimum balance, no monthly fees, and nationwide ATM refunds, we pay you in cash just for utilizing our services!</p>
<p>REWARDS:</p>
<ul>
<li>2.5% APY* paid on balances up to $10,000 if qualifications are met</li>
<li>0.05% APY* if qualifications are not met</li>
<li>Free account with no minimum balance or monthly fees</li>
</ul>

<section class="av_toggle_section" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/CreativeWork">    <div class="single_toggle" data-tags="{All} ">        <p data-fake-id="#toggle-id-2" class="toggler  av-inherit-font-color " itemprop="headline" style="background-color: #355373; color: #ffffff; ">Click Here For Full Account Details &amp; Qualifications<span class="toggle_icon" style="border-color:#ffffff;">        <span class="vert_icon"></span><span class="hor_icon"></span></span></p>        <div id="toggle-id-2-container" class="toggle_wrap ">            <div class="toggle_content invers-color  av-inherit-font-color " itemprop="text" style="background-color: #355373; color: #ffffff; "><ul>
<li>Nationwide ATM fee refunds (Up to $20 per monthly qualification cycle**)</li>
<li>Free Online and Mobile Banking</li>
<li>Free Online Bill PayTO QUALIFY TO GET REWARDS:To earn the reward rate and ATM fee refunds each monthly qualification cycle, simply do the following:
<ul>
<li>Have at least 12 debit card point-of-sale transactions post and settle per qualification cycle</li>
<li>Be enrolled in and agree to receive eStatements</li>
<li>Access Online Banking at least once per qualification cycleIf for some reason you don’t qualify one cycle, don’t worry–you still get a checking account with no service fees. And you can get the rewards back the very next qualification cycle!</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h6>To earn the reward rate and ATM fee refunds each monthly qualification cycle, simply do the following</h6>
<ul>
<li>
<h6>Have at least 12 check card point-of-sale transactions post and settle per qualification cycle</h6>
</li>
<li>
<h6>Receive monthly eStatements</h6>
</li>
<li>
<h6>Access Internet Banking at least once per qualification cycle</h6>
</li>
</ul>
<h6>If for some reason you don’t qualify one cycle, don’t worry–you still get a checking account with no service fees and earn our base rate of interest. And you can get the rewards back the very next qualification cycle!</h6>
<h6 class="small">&nbsp;*APY=Annual Percentage Yield. APYs accurate as of 6/1/2018. Rates may change after account is opened. There is a $50 minimum balance to open account. For Kasasa Cash, if qualifications are met each monthly qualification cycle: (1) Domestic ATM fees incurred during qualification cycle will be reimbursed up to $20 ($4.99 per single transaction) and credited to account on the last day of monthly statement cycle; (2) balances up to $10,000 receive an interest rate of 2.46% with an APY of 2.50%; and (3) balances over $10,000 earn 0.51% interest rate on the portion of the balance over $10,000, resulting in 2.50% – 0.69% APY depending on the balance. If qualifications are not met on Kasasa Cash all balances earn 0.05 % APY. Qualifying transactions must post to and settle Kasasa Cash account during monthly qualification cycle. Transactions may take one or more banking days from the date transaction was made to post to and clear account. **“Monthly Qualification Cycle” means a period beginning one day prior to the first day of the current statement cycle through one day prior to the close of the current statement cycle. The advertised Kasasa Cash APY is based on compounding interest. Interest earned and ATM refunds for Kasasa Cash are automatically transferred to Kasasa Saver each statement cycle (if customer has a Kasasa Saver account). Interest does not compound. Actual interest amount paid may be less than advertised Kasasa Cash APY. The Kasasa Saver APYs may be less than Kasasa Cash APYs. If qualifications in Kasasa Cash are net each monthly qualification cycle: (1) balances up to $50,000 receive an interest rate of 1.10{% and an APY of 1.11% in Kasasa Saver (2) balances over $50,000 in Kasasa Saver earn 0.50% interest rate on portion of balance over $50,000, resulting in 1.11% -0.70% depending on the balance. If qualifications are not met on Kasasa Cash, all balances in Kasasa Saver earn 0.50% APY. Monthly direct deposit is required to have these accounts. ATM receipt must be presented for reimbursement of an individual ATM fee of $5.00 or higher. ATM processed transactions do not count towards qualifying check card transactions. To qualify for Kasasa Saver customer must have a Kasasa Cash account. Contact Us for more information about the qualification cycle. Limit one account per SSN. Fees may reduce earnings. Kasasa and Kasasa Saver are trademarks of Kasasa, Ltd., registered in the U.S.A.</h6>

            <!-- Disclosures -->
<div class="shElement text-center">
    <p class="mb-4">
        <a class="btn btn-secondary shElement--btn text-grey-900" data-toggle="collapse" href="#disclose_default" role="button" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="disclose_default">
            <span class="shElement--more-less toggle-plus text-grey-900"></span>
            <span class="shElement--cta">Disclosures</span>
        </a>
    </p>
    <div class="shElement--body collapse" id="disclose_default">
        <div class="card card-body text-left" tabindex="0">
                <p>
                    <sup>1</sup>
                The Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is effective as of September 27, 2018. The APY is equal to 75% of the current Upper Bound Fed Funds Target Rate. Interest rate and APY will change based on the current Upper Bound Fed Funds Target Rate. Minimum deposit of $20,000 new money required. New money is defined as monies that have not been on deposit with the S&amp;T Bank in the past thirty days. A monthly maintenance fee of $15 will be assessed if $10,000 minimum daily balance is not maintained. The account has a maximum of six (6) third party transactions permitted per month. This is a variable rate account. This account is not available for public funds. Interest rate and APY may change without prior notice. Fees may reduce earnings.
                </p>
                <p>
                    <sup>2</sup>
                This offer is not available to current S<span class="font-secondary">&amp;</span>T Bank checking customers or those who have closed an S<span class="font-secondary">&amp;</span>T Bank checking in the past 12 months. Offer applies to new consumer checking accounts (Select Banking, Preferred Banking, Preferred Banking with Interest, Four Star Banking, and Four Star Banking with Interest only) opened by 8.31.18*. New accounts will not be eligible for offer if any signer has signing authority on an existing S<span class="font-secondary">&amp;</span>T Bank consumer checking account. Signing authority will be defined by the customer name(s) and social security number(s) registered on the account. Offer cannot be combined with any other checking offer and is subject to change or termination without notice. To qualify for the first $100 offer, the new checking account must be opened with a minimum opening balance of $50 between 7.7.18 and 8.31.18 and the following conditions must be met by 9.28.18: (a) at least 10 S<span class="font-secondary">&amp;</span>T Bank Visa Debit card purchases (posted and cleared) must be made and (b) enroll in online statements. The $100 will be credited to the eligible account on 10.12.18. The additional $100 will be credited to the S<span class="font-secondary">&amp;</span>T account on or before 3.08.19 provided the account qualified for the debit card and online statement incentive. The account must remain in good standing (daily ledger balance greater than $10) in order to receive any incentive. If a $50 Refer a Friend incentive was paid out to this account during the promotional period your incentive will then be deducted by that amount. The max incentive you are able to receive during this time period is $200. Subject to 1099 reporting. 
                </p>
                <p>
                    <sup>3</sup>
                Annual Percentage Yield (APY) assumes interest remains on deposit until maturity, and withdrawal of interest will reduce earnings. CD Time Deposit - 1099 is produced in the year interest is paid. This special cannot be combined with any other offer and excludes institutional investors, brokered accounts and money for public funds. Penalty for early withdrawals could affect the APY and could reduce principal for these accounts. This CD Time Deposit APY and interest rate cannot be combined with any other promotion. Additional deposits may be made through automatic transfers from an S&amp;T checking or savings account. Minimum transfer amount is $50.  Deposits may also be made at any branch location.  Customer must have an S&amp;T checking or savings account to open the CD.  Not available on IRAs. This is a variable rate account. The APY and interest rate on the entire account balance will be adjusted and become effective the first Business Day of each month. Deposits made during the month will earn the effective rate from the date of deposit until the rate adjusts. Interest payments will only be available through transfer of funds to an S&amp;T checking or savings account. Interest will be compounded and credited quarterly on March 31, June 30, September 30 and December 31. If withdrawals are made to this account prior to maturity date, a penalty of 90 days simple interest will be imposed. The rate of interest is tied to the 91-Day Treasury Bill rate (Discount rate in effect for the last Treasury Bill auction of the previous month).
                </p>
                <p>
                    <sup>4</sup>
                 Annual Percentage Yield (APY) assumes interest remains on deposit until maturity, and withdrawal of interest will reduce earnings. APY effective date as of June 13, 2018. No withdrawals permitted during the first 7 day period. Entire certificate may be redeemed without penalty after the first seven days. No partial withdrawals. CD will automatically renew into 12 Month Penalty Free CD with rate offered at the time of maturity. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Minimum deposit amount is $1,000. Maximum deposit of $500,000 per household. CD Time Deposit-1099 is produced in the year interest is paid. This promotion is not available for investors and brokered accounts.
                </p>
                <p>
                    <sup>5</sup>
                48 Month CD Time Deposit or IRA - Annual Percentage Yield (APY) assumes interest remains on deposit until maturity, and withdrawal of interest will reduce earnings. CD Time Deposit - 1099 is produced in the year interest is paid. This special cannot be combined with any other offer and excludes institutional investors, brokered accounts and money for public funds. Substantial penalty for early withdrawal of funds.  Penalty for early withdrawals could affect the APY and could reduce the principal for these accounts. Automatically renews into a 48-month CD with the rate offered at the time of maturity. Minimum deposit requirement is $1,000. Offer can be withdrawn at any time.
                </p>
                <p>
                    <sup>6</sup>
                14 Month CD Time Deposit or IRA - Annual Percentage Yield (APY) assumes interest remains on deposit until maturity, and withdrawal of interest will reduce earnings. CD Time Deposit - 1099 is produced in the year interest is paid. This special cannot be combined with any other offer and excludes institutional investors, brokered accounts and money for public funds. Substantial penalty for early withdrawal of funds.  Penalty for early withdrawals could affect the APY and could reduce the principal for these accounts. Automatically renews into a 14-month CD with the rate offered at the time of maturity. Minimum deposit requirement is $1,000. Offer can be withdrawn at any time.
                </p>
        </div>

<p>eOne Checking eligibility is limited to consumers who apply online and who do not have an existing checking account with Salem Five Bank at the time of the application. Account must be opened with funds not currently on deposit with Salem Five Bank.<br><br>*With an eOne Checking Account, Salem Five will never charge a fee for ATM transactions conducted at non-Salem Five ATMs, and we will reimburse the fees other banks charge up to $15 per statement cycle.<br><br>eOne Checking earns 0.25% APY (Annual Percentage Yield) on daily balances of $0.01 - $1,000,000. Salem Five reserves the right to transfer balances over $1,000,000 to the eOne Funding Account which currently earns an APY of 0.10%.<br><br>Minimum balance to open the account is $100. The rate may change after the account is opened. The stated APY applies to new eOne accounts opened after 06/05/2012. Fees may reduce earning. Rewards apply to point-of-sale, non-PIN based debit card transactions (when you choose “credit”) with no minimum purchase amount and no cap to the cash rewards you may earn.&nbsp; ATM and PIN based transactions do not qualify.&nbsp; Cash Debit Rewards is at the rate of $0.05 for each debit card purchase (when you choose “credit”).&nbsp; Rewards accrued are credited to your account on the last day of the statement cycle in which the purchase is posted.&nbsp; Your account must be open and in good standing on the date the rewards are posted to receive the reward.&nbsp; We reserve the right to deduct rewards credits if you return merchandise for which you have qualified or received debit rewards.&nbsp; Any taxes related to debit rewards are the recipient’s sole responsibility.&nbsp; Program may be terminated at any time at our sole discretion.<br><br>This offer is not available at Salem Five branch locations. Consumer accounts only.</p>
</div>

</li><li class="block accordionitemblock   panel">
    <a title="Fully Insured with FDIC and DIF" class="accordion-header" data-toggle="collapse" href="#fullyinsuredwithfdicanddif" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="fullyinsuredwithfdicanddif" data-parent="#accordion-grp-1">
        Fully Insured with FDIC and DIF
    </a>
    <div class="collapse global-component-spacing-top" id="fullyinsuredwithfdicanddif">
        <div class="container">
<h3>Member FDIC and Member DIF</h3>
<p>Thanks to a combination of deposit insurance safeguards, each depositor at Salem Five Cents Savings Bank, whether using a physical branch office, salemfive.com or salemfivedirect.com, is fully insured, regardless of the number of accounts or the total funds on deposit.</p>
<p><strong>It works like this</strong>: The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) now insures each depositor, for each ownership category, up to $250,000.</p>
<p>Deposits at Salem Five in excess of the standard insurance amounts provided by the FDIC are covered by the Depositors Insurance Fund (DIF). The DIF is a private, industry-sponsored insurance fund that insures all deposits above FDIC limits at Massachusetts-chartered savings banks. The DIF was established by the Massachusetts legislature in 1932 and has been insuring deposits since 1934. No depositor has ever lost a penny in a bank insured by both the FDIC and the DIF.</p>
<p><strong>The result?</strong> Your deposits at Salem Five are completely protected – without limitation.</p>
</div>
        <ul class="list-unstyled list-accordion-links gold 7613"><li class="block accordionblock   panel">

<section class="accordions global-component-spacing global-component-spacing-top" id="fdicfaqs" fdic="" dif="" faqs="">
    <div class="container">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-sm-12">
                    <h2>FDIC/DIF FAQs</h2>
                                        <script>
                            $(document).ready(function () {

                                setTimeout(function () {
                                    $(".2968 .accordionitemblock:first").find('.collapse').collapse('show');
                                }, 1000)
                                
                            })
                        </script>

                <ul class="list-unstyled list-accordion-links small 2968"><li class="block accordionitemblock   panel">
    <a title="I've noticed that my bank displays the FDIC and DIF symbols. What does Member FDIC/Member DIF mean?" class="accordion-header" data-toggle="collapse" href="#ivenoticedthatmybankdisplaysthefdicanddifsymbolswhatdoesmemberfdicmemberdifmean" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="ivenoticedthatmybankdisplaysthefdicanddifsymbolswhatdoesmemberfdicmemberdifmean" data-parent="#accordion-grp-1">
        I've noticed that my bank displays the FDIC and DIF symbols. What does Member FDIC/Member DIF mean?
    </a>
    <div class="collapse in" id="ivenoticedthatmybankdisplaysthefdicanddifsymbolswhatdoesmemberfdicmemberdifmean" aria-expanded="true" style="">
        <p>Salem Five is a member of both organizations that insure depositors' funds against loss. The first $250,000 per depositor is insured by the FDIC.</p>
        
    </div>
</li><li class="block accordionitemblock   panel">
    <a title="Do all banks offer FDIC and DIF insurance coverage?" class="accordion-header" data-toggle="collapse" href="#doallbanksofferfdicanddifinsurancecoverage" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="doallbanksofferfdicanddifinsurancecoverage" data-parent="#accordion-grp-1">
        Do all banks offer FDIC and DIF insurance coverage?
    </a>
    <div class="collapse" id="doallbanksofferfdicanddifinsurancecoverage">
        <p>No. While there are other insuring entities, only Massachusetts-chartered savings banks offer the additional protection of DIF insurance.</p>
        
    </div>
</li><li class="block accordionitemblock   panel">
    <a title="Are all my deposits at Salem Five insured in full?" class="accordion-header" data-toggle="collapse" href="#areallmydepositsatsalemfiveinsuredinfull" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="areallmydepositsatsalemfiveinsuredinfull" data-parent="#accordion-grp-1">
        Are all my deposits at Salem Five insured in full?
    </a>
    <div class="collapse" id="areallmydepositsatsalemfiveinsuredinfull">
        <p>Yes. All types of deposit accounts are covered, including savings, checking, and NOW accounts; money market accounts; certificates of deposit; IRAs and Keoghs; and all other deposit accounts held with Massachusetts-chartered savings banks.</p>
        
    </div>
</li><li class="block accordionitemblock   panel">
    <a title="Has any depositor ever lost money in a Member FDIC/Member DIF bank?" class="accordion-header" data-toggle="collapse" href="#hasanydepositoreverlostmoneyinamemberfdicmemberdifbank" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="hasanydepositoreverlostmoneyinamemberfdicmemberdifbank" data-parent="#accordion-grp-1">
        Has any depositor ever lost money in a Member FDIC/Member DIF bank?
    </a>
    <div class="collapse" id="hasanydepositoreverlostmoneyinamemberfdicmemberdifbank">
        <p>No. The FDIC has always paid deposits in full up to its insurance limit. The DIF has always paid all deposits in excess of the FDIC's limit. No depositor has ever lost a penny in an FDIC/DIF member bank since either Fund was established.</p>
        
    </div>
</li><li class="block accordionitemblock   panel">
    <a title="How financially strong are the FDIC and the DIF?" class="accordion-header" data-toggle="collapse" href="#howfinanciallystrongarethefdicandthedif" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="howfinanciallystrongarethefdicandthedif" data-parent="#accordion-grp-1">
        How financially strong are the FDIC and the DIF?
    </a>
    <div class="collapse" id="howfinanciallystrongarethefdicandthedif">
        <p>The FDIC is backed by the full faith and credit of the U.S. Treasury. While the DIF is not backed by federal, state, or local governments, the Fund is very strong and has extensive recourses. The banking crisis of the late 1980s serves as a poignant example of the DIF's financial strength. In this period, 18 DIF member banks failed. These banks contained funds from over 6,300 excess depositors. Their excess deposits totaled $250 million. Each and every depositor was paid in full. This was the worst period in the history of the Massachusetts thrift industry, yet the Fund has more money today than it did at the start of the crisis.</p>
        
    </div>
</li><li class="block accordionitemblock   panel">
    <a title="Is the DIF subject to any form of regulatory scrutiny?" class="accordion-header" data-toggle="collapse" href="#isthedifsubjecttoanyformofregulatoryscrutiny" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="isthedifsubjecttoanyformofregulatoryscrutiny" data-parent="#accordion-grp-1">
        Is the DIF subject to any form of regulatory scrutiny?
    </a>
    <div class="collapse" id="isthedifsubjecttoanyformofregulatoryscrutiny">
        <p>Yes. The DIF's financial records are examined regularly by the Massachusetts Commissioner of Banks, and audited annually by an independent auditor.</p>
        
    </div>
</li><li class="block accordionitemblock   panel">
    <a title="If a Member FDIC/Member DIF bank ever got into financial trouble, how would I get my money?" class="accordion-header" data-toggle="collapse" href="#ifamemberfdicmemberdifbankevergotintofinancialtroublehowwouldigetmymoney" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ifamemberfdicmemberdifbankevergotintofinancialtroublehowwouldigetmymoney" data-parent="#accordion-grp-1">
        If a Member FDIC/Member DIF bank ever got into financial trouble, how would I get my money?
    </a>
    <div class="collapse" id="ifamemberfdicmemberdifbankevergotintofinancialtroublehowwouldigetmymoney">
        <p>Based on past experience, arrangements would be made for all deposits to be automatically transferred to another bank. All your deposit funds would be available with no interruption of service.</p>
        
    </div>
</li><li class="block accordionitemblock   panel">
    <a title="I'd like to buy a CD for $325,000. Is it fully insured if I place it in one account, or will I need to open two accounts in different names?" class="accordion-header" data-toggle="collapse" href="#idliketobuyacdfor325000isitfullyinsuredifiplaceitinoneaccountorwillineedtoopentwoaccountsindifferentnames" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="idliketobuyacdfor325000isitfullyinsuredifiplaceitinoneaccountorwillineedtoopentwoaccountsindifferentnames" data-parent="#accordion-grp-1">
        I'd like to buy a CD for $325,000. Is it fully insured if I place it in one account, or will I need to open two accounts in different names?
    </a>
    <div class="collapse" id="idliketobuyacdfor325000isitfullyinsuredifiplaceitinoneaccountorwillineedtoopentwoaccountsindifferentnames">
        <p>You can buy a single CD for the entire amount. At a Member FDIC/Member DIF member bank, your deposits are fully insured, even if they exceed $250,000.</p>
        
    </div>
</li><li class="block accordionitemblock   panel">
    <a title="Does the FDIC or the DIF insure investments in bank mutual funds?" class="accordion-header" data-toggle="collapse" href="#doesthefdicorthedifinsureinvestmentsinbankmutualfunds" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="doesthefdicorthedifinsureinvestmentsinbankmutualfunds" data-parent="#accordion-grp-1">
        Does the FDIC or the DIF insure investments in bank mutual funds?
    </a>
    <div class="collapse" id="doesthefdicorthedifinsureinvestmentsinbankmutualfunds">
        <p>No. Both the FDIC and DIF only cover deposits.</p>
        
    </div>
</li><li class="block accordionitemblock   panel">
    <a title="Where can I learn more about the FDIC and DIF?" class="accordion-header" data-toggle="collapse" href="#wherecanilearnmoreaboutthefdicanddif" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="wherecanilearnmoreaboutthefdicanddif" data-parent="#accordion-grp-1">
        Where can I learn more about the FDIC and DIF?
    </a>
    <div class="collapse" id="wherecanilearnmoreaboutthefdicanddif">
        <p>Visit the <a title="FDIC" href="https://www.fdic.gov/consumers/consumer/news/index.html" target="_blank">FDIC</a> and <a title="DIF" href="https://www.difxs.com/DIF/Home.aspx" target="_blank">DIF</a> websites where you can access additional information. </p>
        
    </div>
</li></ul>
            </div>
            
        </div>
    </div>
</section>
</li><li class="block twocolumnfeaturesblock   panel"><section class="container online-banking-features global-component-spacing" id="Features">

https://www.saversbank.com/News-Resources/Current-Rates/Deposit-Rates, #LiveHTMLWrapper814, <div id="LiveHTMLWrapper814" class="livehtml"><h1>Deposit Rates</h1>
<p class="largetext">We offer competitive checking and savings rates to align with managing your money.</p>
<h2>Ka-Ching Checking</h2>
<table class="table rt-responsive-table-0 rt-responsive-table" data-rt-max-width="746">
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <th>Tiered Interest Levels</th>
            <th>Interest Rate</th>
            <th>APY*</th>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>Up to $25,000&nbsp;</td>
            <td>1.95%</td>
            <td>2.00%<br>
            If qualifications are met.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>Over $25,000</td>
            <td>0.25%</td>
            <td>2.00%-0.60% <br>
            Depending on balance, if qualifications are met.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>All Balances</td>
            <td>0.05%</td>
            <td>0.05%<br>
            If qualifications are not met.&nbsp;</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
<p class="smalltext">*APY=Annual Percentage Yield accurate as of 8/1/18.   Rates are variable and may change after account opening. If qualifications are met each monthly qualification cycle: (1) Up to $30.00 of national ATM surcharges posted and settled per qualification cycle will be reimbursed and credited to the account on the last day of monthly statement cycle; (2) Up to $15.00 of Savers Bank foreign ATM processing fees posted and settled per qualification cycle will be reimbursed and credited to account on the last day of monthly statement cycle;  (3) balances from $10.00 up to $25,000 earn 1.95% interest rate (2.00% APY); and (4) balances $25,000.01 and over earn 0.25% interest rate (2.00% - 0.60% APY depending on account balance) on the portion of the balance over $25,000. If qualifications are not met, all balances earn an interest rate and APY of 0.05%, and the account does not receive ATM surcharge rebates or Savers Bank foreign ATM processing fee rebates for that period. To qualify you must have at least: (1) 12 posted and settled Debit Card purchases (ATM transactions and debit card purchases processed as ATM transactions do not count towards qualifying debit card purchases); (2) Be enrolled in, receive and review eStatements; and (3) Have 1 direct deposit or 1 bill payment or automatic payment (ACH) post and settle (transfers between accounts within our bank or via online banking do not count towards qualifying ACH or bill pay transactions). Qualifying transactions must post and settle to the account during each monthly qualification cycle. Transactions may take one or more banking days from the date the transaction was made to post and settle to an account. “Monthly Qualification Cycle” means a period beginning one business day prior to the first day of the current statement cycle through one business day prior to the close of the current statement cycle. Monthly statement cycle is not the same as monthly qualification cycle. If monthly qualifications are not met, this account will still function as a free account, with no monthly service fee. Minimum to open account is $10. No minimum balance required to earn rewards or maintain account. Available as a personal account only. Limit one account per tax identification number. </p>
<p class="smalltext">&nbsp;</p>

<p class="smalltext">*Promotional rate is for accounts opened between 2/20/18 and 4/30/18 and is for new funds not already on deposit at Savers Bank.  Rate is subject to change after account opening if promotional rate qualification requirements aren’t met and/or after the promotional rate period ends on 4/30/19.  The 1.25% APY money market must have and maintain an active Savers Bank checking account to receive the advertised promotional money market rate.  If the account does not remain “active” or the promotional money market daily balance falls below the $50,000 minimum deposit requirement during the monthly statement cycle, the interest rate will be permanently reduced to our standard tiered money market rates.  Active checking account is defined as having at least 10 debit card point of sales transactions per month during the promotional rate period.  Fees may reduce earnings. Other terms and conditions may apply. Transfers from a money market account to another account or to third parties by preauthorized, automatic, telephone, or computer transfer or by check, draft, or similar order to third parties are limited to six per statement cycle. Limits do not apply to deposits, withdrawals or transfers made at a branch, by mail, or by ATM.  </p>

<h2>Certificates of Deposit / Individual Retirement Accounts</h2>
<table class="table rt-responsive-table-6 rt-responsive-table" data-rt-max-width="746">

<p class="smalltext"><em>A substantial penalty is imposed for early withdrawal on certificates.</em></p>
<p class="smalltext"><em>* APY = Annual Percentage Yield. Annual Percentage Yield is based on the assumption that the account will be rolled over at maturity for the same term and remain on deposit for one year. The existing interest rate may not be available at maturity.
APY is earned only if interest remains in account. A withdrawal of the interest earned will reduce future earnings.</em></p>
<p class="smalltext"><em>Minimum deposit is required to open the account. Fees or other conditions could reduce the earnings on the accounts shown above. Interest is not earned if the account balance falls below $10.00.</em></p>
<p class="smalltext">**The 2.25% APY CD is for a term of 15 months.  $500.00 minimum deposit is required to open  account.   APY assumes interest will stay on deposit until maturity.  You must maintain $10 in the account to obtain the disclosed  APY.  A withdrawal of the interest earned will reduce future earnings. A penalty is imposed for early withdrawal on certificates.  Fees or other conditions could reduce the earnings.   </p>
<p class="smalltext"><em><strong>PLEASE NOTE:&nbsp;</strong>Interest rates and programs are subject to change, please call your local representative for updated interest rates and program information.</em></p>

                      <p class="small">Interest Rates and Annual Percentage Yields are current as of July 10, 2018.</p>
<p class="small">Fees could reduce the earnings on the account.</p>
<p class="small">The interest rate and annual percentage yield is subject to change at the Bank's discretion*</p>
<p class="small"><br>^) A penalty may be imposed for early withdrawal.</p>
<p class="small">^^) The interest rate and annual percentage yield may change after account opening.</p>
<p class="small">^^^) Daily balance. The amount of the principal in the account each day.</p>

http://www.mysbank.com/personal/checking/rewards-checking.html, #productTabs, <dl id="productTabs" style="height: 1673px;" class="ae-tabset"><dt class="tabSummary label selected ae-label ae-tabset-tab ae-tabset-activetab" role="button" aria-expanded="true" tabindex="0" aria-controls="ae_mel_panel_0" id="ae_mel_tab_0">Summary</dt><dd data-name="tabSummary" data-bv="" class="pane ae-tabset-content" style="position: absolute;" id="ae_mel_panel_0" aria-labelledby="ae_mel_tab_0"><div class="tabDiv"><p><span>Simplify your banking experience and get rewarded for doing it! Earn really high interest and nationwide ATM fee refunds* — just for doing things you're probably already doing, like using your debit card and banking online.</span></p><p><span>And there are no balance requirements or per-check charges with this free e-checking account. It truly is money management made easy.</span></p><h3 role="heading" aria-level="2">Details:		</h3><ul><li><span>Free checking account with interest plus rewards</span></li><li class="textVariant1"><span>1.06% APY* on balances up to $25,000.99</span></li><li class="textVariant1"><span>1.06% to 0.05% APY* on balances $25,001.00 and over</span></li><li class="textVariant1"><span>0.01% APY* if qualifications are not met</span></li><li><span>Rates are variable and are subject to change</span></li><li><span>Nationwide ATM fee refunds (up to $25 each month)*</span></li><li><span>No minimum balance to maintain</span></li><li><span>Unlimited checking</span></li><li><span><a href="/personal/services/personalized-debit-cards.html">Debit card</a></span></li><li><span><a href="/personal/services/online-banking-bill-pay.html">Online banking with bill pay</a></span></li><li><span><a href="/personal/services/mobile-banking.html">Mobile banking</a></span></li><li><span><a href="/personal/services/go-green-estatements.html">eStatements</a></span></li><li><span>Telephone banking</span></li><li><span>$250 minimum deposit to open</span></li></ul><h3 role="heading" aria-level="2">Qualifications:</h3><p><span>Earning the rewards rate and ATM fee refunds is so easy! To earn your rewards, simply do the following activities in your Rewards Checking account during the monthly qualification cycle.</span></p><ul><li><span>10 debit card POS (point of sale) transactions post and settle per qualification cycle</span></li><li><span>Have at least one Direct Deposit or ACH Auto Debit post and settle per qualification cycle</span></li><li><span>Be enrolled and receive<span><a href="/personal/services/go-green-estatements.html"> eStatement</a></span> notice</span></li><li><span>Be enrolled and log into online banking</span></li></ul><p><span>If you should miss the rewards one month, don't worry. You still get a checking account that earns the base rate of 0.01% APY*. And you can get the rewards back the very next month you qualify!</span></p><h3 role="heading" aria-level="2">Upgrade to Real Rewards Saver</h3><p><span>You can make even more with your money. <span><a href="/personal/checking/realrewards-with-saver.html">Real Rewards with Saver</a></span> maximizes your earnings with a linked savings account that offers you a second great interest rate.</span></p><br><p><span>Open your accounts online today — or at any of our locations in Midland, Odessa, San Antonio, Big Lake, McCamey, Crane, Monahans, or Devine.</span></p><div class="productDisclaimer"><p class="disclaimer"><span>*Minimum deposit to open account is $250.  Annual Percentage Yield (APY) accurate as of 10/1/2018. Rate tiers are as follows: 1.06% APY applies to balances of $.01 - $25,000.99, and 1.06% APY – 0.05% APY applies to balances of $25,001.00 and over if qualifications are met during the monthly qualification cycle.  0.01% APY applies to all balances if monthly qualifications are not met.  Rates may change after the account is opened.  Fees may reduce earnings.Qualifying transactions must post and settle the account during the monthly qualification cycle. Transactions may take one or more business days from the transaction date to post to an account from the date the transaction is made. Intra-bank transfers do not count as qualifying ACH transactions. Rewards Checking is available to personal accounts and is limited to one account per social security number.The "statement cycle" is the first business day of the month through the last business day of the month.  The "qualification cycle" is the period beginning one business day prior to the first day of the current statement cycle through one business day prior to the close of the current statement cycle.  Therefore, the above mentioned minimum activity will be determined based upon transactions posted and settled one day prior to the last business day of the month.  Transactions posted and settled on the last business day of the month will be counted toward minimum activity for the following qualification cycle. ATM Fee reimbursements up to $25/$5 per occurrence provided only if qualifications are met within the monthly qualification cycle.  The ATM refunds will be credited to your account on the last day of the statement cycle. ATM processed transactions do not count towards qualifying debit card transactions.</span></p></div></div></dd></dl>

    Open Online</a></div><div id="currentCustomer1" class="text-popup mfp-hide"><h3 role="heading" aria-level="2">Do you currently have an account with Security Bank?</h3><div><a href="/applications/application.html?productInode=4c281931-0591-4fbe-b7b1-38a9b4f72d3f&amp;dynamicFormType=shortApplication" class="primary-button" target="_parent">Yes</a><a href="/applications/open-an-account.html?productInode=4c281931-0591-4fbe-b7b1-38a9b4f72d3f&amp;dynamicFormType=application" class="primary-button" target="_parent">No</a></div>
</div><div class="page-tabs accordion"><div class="accordion-title details active ae-active" aria-expanded="true" role="button" tabindex="0">Details</div><div class="accordion-content details" style="display: block; overflow: hidden;"><p></p>
<ul>
<li>Free checking that pays high interest</li>
<li>
<p>2.50% (2.53% APY*) on balances up to and including $50,000</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>0.30% (2.53% to 0.30% APY* range) on balances over $50,000</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>0.10% APY* paid even if qualifications aren't met</p>
</li>
<li>Refunds on ATM withdrawal fees, nationwide (up to $25 monthly)*</li>
<li>No minimum balance to earn rewards</li>
<li>No monthly maintenance fees</li>
<li>Free&nbsp;<a href="/services-tools/account-services/online-banking-bill-pay.html">online banking &amp; bill pay</a></li>
<li>Free&nbsp;<a href="/services-tools/account-services/mobile-banking-mobile-deposit.html">mobile banking with mobile deposit</a></li>
<li>Free&nbsp;<a href="/services-tools/account-services/estatements.html">e-Statements</a></li>
<li>Free&nbsp;<a href="/personal/visa-debit-card.html">Visa® debit card</a></li>
<li>$100 minimum deposit to open</li>
</ul>
<h3>Earning Your Rewards is Simple.</h3>
<p>To bring home your full rewards, enrollments must be in place and all of the following transactions and activities must post and settle to your Security Bonus Checking account during each Monthly Qualification Cycle:</p>
<ul>
<li>At least 1 direct deposit, ACH credit, or ACH payment transaction</li>
<li>At least 10 debit card purchases of $3.00 or more</li>
<li>Be enrolled in and review e-Statements</li>
</ul>
<p>Easy. In fact, these qualifications were designed to make your banking experience even easier. And don't worry if you miss one month. You'll still earn our base interest rate, and you can earn your rewards in full the very next cycle!</p></div></div><div class="secondary-cta"><div class="primary-button"><a href="#currentCustomer1" class="currentCustomerPopup">
          
    Open Online</a></div><div id="currentCustomer1" class="text-popup mfp-hide"><h3 role="heading" aria-level="2">Do you currently have an account with Security Bank?</h3><div><a href="/applications/application.html?productInode=4c281931-0591-4fbe-b7b1-38a9b4f72d3f&amp;dynamicFormType=shortApplication" class="primary-button" target="_parent">Yes</a><a href="/applications/open-an-account.html?productInode=4c281931-0591-4fbe-b7b1-38a9b4f72d3f&amp;dynamicFormType=application" class="primary-button" target="_parent">No</a></div>
</div></div><div class="disclaimer"><p>*APY=Annual Percentage Yield. APYs accurate as of 11/1/2018. Rates may change after account is opened. Minimum to open is $100. If qualifications are met each monthly qualification cycle: (1)Domestic ATM fees incurred during qualification cycle will be reimbursed up to $25 and credited to account on the last day of monthly statement cycle; (2)balances up to and including $50,000 receive APY of 2.53%; and (3)balances over $50,000 earn 0.30% interest rate on portion of balance over $50,000, resulting in a range of 2.53% to 0.30% APY depending on the balance. If qualifications are not met, all balances earn 0.10% APY. Qualifying transactions must post to and settle account during monthly qualification cycle. Transactions may take one or more banking days from the date transaction was made to post to and settle an account. Transfers between accounts do not count as qualifying transactions. ATM-processed transactions do not count towards qualifying debit card transactions. "Monthly Qualification Cycle" means a period beginning&nbsp;two business days prior to the first day of the current statement cycle through&nbsp;two business days&nbsp;prior to the close of the current statement cycle. Fees may reduce earnings. Limit two accounts per household.</p></div></div>

    <p><span class="ssrte-disclaimers">Minimum balances to earn APY are as follows: Certificates and IRA Certificates, $500; Future Builder Certificates, $250; Jumbo Share Certificates, $25,000. Penalty for early withdrawal.</span></p>

    <li><span class="ssrte-disclaimers">Certificates are Share Certificates.</span></li>
</ol>
<p><span class="ssrte-disclaimers">† This Security Service Federal Credit Union Current Dividend Rates disclosure is incorporated as a part of and in addition to the <a href="/-/media/files/application-disclosures/deposittc.pdf?la=en&amp;hash=83F0FCF5BAF4BF30C85E4DCEBC3BA1734CFFB20A" target="_blank">All About Your Security Service Accounts</a> brochure, the Security Service <a href="/-/media/files/application-disclosures/truthinsavings.pdf?la=en&amp;hash=2318A6D776A7C96FB2F7A7FF3702A4BCEBDAEFA4" target="_blank">Truth in Savings</a> brochure, and the <a href="/-/media/files/application-disclosures/consumer-fee-schedule.pdf?la=en&amp;hash=0106D6B2C56CD4F8AF1433EAD914EDD07DB3EA70" target="_blank">Security Service Fee Schedule for Consumer Deposit Accounts</a>. Please refer to these items for additional terms, conditions and limitations which may be associated with your specific account(s).</span></p>
<p><span class="ssrte-disclaimers"><br>
</span></p>
<p><span class="ssrte-disclaimers">†† APY = Annual Percentage Yield. APY is accurate as of 11/16/18. The Dividend Rate and APY may change without notice at the discretion of the Security Service Federal Credit Union Board of Directors. Fees may reduce earnings on your account. Contact an employee for further information or to obtain current rate information at 1.888.415.7878.</span></p>
